name: ha-crud-api
description: Home Assistant CRUD REST API for managing Lovelace dashboards and discovering entities/devices

tools.name: ha_list_dashboards
tools.description: List all Lovelace dashboards in Home Assistant. Returns an array of dashboard metadata including id, url_path, title, icon, mode (storage/yaml), and visibility settings.

tools.name: ha_get_dashboard
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific dashboard. Use 'lovelace' as the dashboard_id for the default dashboard.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path (e.g., 'my-dashboard') or 'lovelace' for the default dashboard

tools.name: ha_get_dashboard_config
tools.description: Get the full configuration (views, cards, etc.) of a dashboard. This returns the actual dashboard content that defines what users see.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path or 'lovelace' for default

tools.name: ha_create_dashboard
tools.description: Create a new Lovelace dashboard. Requires admin privileges. The url_path must contain a hyphen (e.g., 'my-dashboard').

url_path.description: Unique URL path for the dashboard. Must contain a hyphen (e.g., 'my-dashboard', 'home-view')

show_in_sidebar.description: Whether to show this dashboard in the sidebar

require_admin.description: Whether only admins can view this dashboard

tools.name: ha_update_dashboard
tools.description: Fully update a dashboard's metadata (title, icon, etc.). Requires admin privileges. Cannot modify YAML-based dashboards.

tools.name: ha_patch_dashboard
tools.description: Partially update a dashboard's metadata. Only provided fields are updated. Requires admin privileges.

tools.name: ha_update_dashboard_config
tools.description: Replace the full configuration (views, cards) of a dashboard. This is how you upload dashboard JSON content. Requires admin privileges.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path or 'lovelace' for default

config.description: Dashboard configuration object containing views array and optional settings

views.description: Array of view objects, each containing cards

tools.name: ha_delete_dashboard
tools.description: Delete a dashboard. Cannot delete the default 'lovelace' dashboard or YAML-based dashboards. Requires admin privileges.

dashboard_id.description: Dashboard URL path to delete (cannot be 'lovelace')

tools.name: ha_list_entities
tools.description: List all entities in Home Assistant with optional filtering. Returns entity_id, state, domain, friendly_name, device_id, area_id, platform, and more. Use filters to narrow results.

tools.name: ha_get_entity
tools.description: Get full details for a specific entity including state, attributes, device info, area, and floor. Useful for understanding entity capabilities.

tools.name: ha_list_domains
tools.description: List all entity domains in Home Assistant with entity counts and descriptions. Useful for understanding what types of entities are available.

tools.name: ha_list_domain_entities
tools.description: List all entities for a specific domain with full attributes. More detailed than ha_list_entities with domain filter.

tools.name: ha_list_devices
tools.description: List all devices in Home Assistant with optional filtering. Returns device info including name, manufacturer, model, area, and entity count.

tools.name: ha_get_device
tools.description: Get full details for a specific device including all its entities. Useful for understanding what entities belong to a device.

tools.name: ha_list_areas
tools.description: List all areas in Home Assistant. Returns area info including name, floor, icon, and device/entity counts. Useful for organizing dashboards by location.

tools.name: ha_get_area
tools.description: Get full details for a specific area including all devices and entities in that area. Useful for building area-specific dashboards.

tools.name: ha_list_floors
tools.description: List all floors in Home Assistant. Returns floor info including name, level, icon, and area count. Useful for multi-story home organization.

tools.name: ha_get_floor
tools.description: Get full details for a specific floor including all areas on that floor. Useful for building floor-specific views.

tools.name: ha_list_integrations
tools.description: List all active integrations in Home Assistant. Returns integration info including name, config entry count, device/entity counts, and state.

tools.name: ha_get_integration
tools.description: Get full details for a specific integration including config entries, devices, and entity breakdown by domain.

tools.name: ha_list_services
tools.description: List all available services grouped by domain. Returns a dictionary with domains as keys and arrays of service names as values.

tools.name: ha_list_domain_services
tools.description: List all services for a specific domain with names, descriptions, and field names.

tools.name: ha_get_service
tools.description: Get full details for a specific service including all fields, their descriptions, types, selectors, and examples. Essential for building automations.
